message.body: Hey, do you want two tickets to see Philly play Montreal on the 29th?
Yes totally I can go, will there be a beer bus? Maybe Chris can go with me
Yeah Brauhaus is still running the bus, we took it last weekend. If you want the tickets I'll email them to you. We're looking real good this season
Want me to email you our tickets now or did you want to get your beer bus seats first?
U can just email them to me I'll work out the details
If it turns out you or someone you know wants to drive to this game our tickets came with parking passes so if you want the one for that game just let me know
I just sent it, i think you'll get an email and you have to confirm it or something
Ok thanks! I'll let u know about the parking pass
